channel.title: 508 - how to make jad do all 3 attacks -508
channel.description:
i want to make jad to all 3 attacks, mage range and melee
i got the melee
just want to add range and mage
does anyone know how to add that? and i know it can be done cuz i joined a 317 server, the jad on there had all 3 attacks
